summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2098, for the improvement of 4th Avenue South in the City of Seattle, from the south margin of Main Street to the south margin of Jackson Street, by planking the same with timbers 6 inches by 6 inches, laid diagonally, under Ordinance No. 21192 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
